modal.delete_account.title: Account deletion
modal.delete_account.text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your data will be lost, you can download your report from the Statistics page before confirming
addWallet.title: Add new wallet
addWallet.name: Name
addWallet.setDefault.helperText: If you choose this wallet as default, settings of another default wallet will be changed and a new wallet will be default.
addWallet.validationErrorMessage.name: Please, enter wallet name
addWallet.validationErrorMessage.tooShor: Name must be longer than 1 symbols
addWallet.validationErrorMessage.tooLong: Name must be no longer than 30 symbols
